title: LoL launcher disappears!??!??!
body:
my LoL launcher fully loaded but than when i click play it just closes itself.

please help me!!!

replies.body: Are you sure it's the "Play" button and not the "Launch" button?
Might be the result of a corrupt file. Have you attempted repairing it?
i'm not sure what file it is. and i can't open the launcher now. i can't even re-download it now.

You don't *need* to know what file it is; exactly what did you try to do? To repair the client you click the question mark icon in the patcher, and then 'Repair'.

What page do you see come up when you visit [this site](https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)?
